data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi từng rất hòa thuận với nhau cho đến khi chúng tôi học khác trường đại học.
data.en_hint: We used to get on with each other very well until we got into different universities.
data.content_game_1: We used to get on with each other very well until we got into different universities.
data.answer_en_hint: We used to get on with each other very well until we got into different universities.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thực sự ngưỡng mộ những người luôn cố gắng tìm kiếm niềm vui và hy vọng ngay cả trong tình huống xấu nhất.
data.en_hint: I really look up to those who always try to find joy and hope even in the worst situation.
data.content_game_1: I really look up to those who always try to find joy and hope even in the worst situation.
data.answer_en_hint: I really look up to those who always try to find joy and hope even in the worst situation.

data.trans_hint: Dù ở xa nhau nhưng chúng tôi luôn giữ liên lạc trên mạng xã hội.
data.en_hint: Even though we were far from each other, we always stayed in touch on social media.
data.content_game_1: Even though we were far from each other, we always stayed in touch on social media.
data.answer_en_hint: Even though we were far from each other, we always stayed in touch on social media.

data.trans: Tranh cãi và bất hòa với ai
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy bất hòa với gia đình kể từ khi anh ấy chuyển ra ngoài để học đại học.
data.en_hint: He fell out with his family since he moved out to go to college.
data.content_game_1: He fell out with his family since he moved out to go to college.
data.answer_en_hint: He fell out with his family since he moved out to go to college.

data.trans: Không thân thiết với ai nữa
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi chỉ đơn giản là không còn thân nhau nữa vì chúng tôi quá bận rộn với những công việc của riêng mình.
data.en_hint: We simply grew apart from each other as we were too busy with our own stuff.
data.content_game_1: We simply grew apart from each other as we were too busy with our own stuff.
data.answer_en_hint: We simply grew apart from each other as we were too busy with our own stuff.

data.trans: Giống ai đó (về ngoại hình, tính cách)
data.trans_hint: Tôi giống bố ở dáng người cao và khuôn mặt tròn, nhưng tôi lại có đôi mắt của mẹ.
data.en_hint: I take after my dad with my tall figure and round face, but I have my mother's eyes.
data.content_game_1: I take after my dad with my tall figure and round face, but I have my mother's eyes.
data.answer_en_hint: I take after my dad with my tall figure and round face, but I have my mother's eyes.

data.trans_hint: Cha mẹ anh ấy phải làm việc ngoài thị trấn suốt, nên anh ấy lớn lên với bà.
data.en_hint: His parents had to work out of town all the time, so he grew up with his grandmother.
data.content_game_1: His parents had to work out of town all the time, so he grew up with his grandmother.
data.answer_en_hint: His parents had to work out of town all the time, so he grew up with his grandmother.

data.trans_hint: Trong gia đình, tôi thực sự thân thiết với em gái. Chúng tôi kể cho nhau nghe mọi thứ và không bao giờ gây gổ đánh nhau.
data.en_hint: In my family, I am really close with my sister. We tell each other everything and never fight.
data.content_game_1: In my family, I am really close with my sister. We tell each other everything and never fight.
data.answer_en_hint: In my family, I am really close with my sister. We tell each other everything and never fight.

data.trans: (Ai đó) Là người vui vẻ khi ở chung
data.trans_hint: Tôi rất hợp với bố tôi, ở bên cạnh ông rất vui và chúng tôi có cùng quan điểm trong rất nhiều thứ.
data.en_hint: I get along really well with my father, he is good fun to be with, and we see eye to eye on many things.
data.content_game_1: I get along really well with my father, he is good fun to be with, and we see eye to eye on many things.
data.answer_en_hint: I get along really well with my father, he is good fun to be with, and we see eye to eye on many things.

data.trans_hint: Cha tôi đôi khi hơi lỗ mãng, nhưng ông ấy là một người rất chân thành và tốt bụng.
data.en_hint: My father can be extremely blunt sometimes, but he is a very genuine and kind person.
data.content_game_1: My father can be extremely blunt sometimes, but he is a very genuine and kind person.
data.answer_en_hint: My father can be extremely blunt sometimes, but he is a very genuine and kind person.
